plot: A young man wakes up and goes about his day. He brushes his teeth, eats breakfast, gets dressed and checks his mail. His actions gradually become more unusual.
title: A Banal Quest
plot_es: A young man wakes up and goes about his day. He brushes his teeth, eats breakfast, gets dressed and checks his mail. His actions gradually become more unusual.
plot_en: A young man wakes up and goes about his day. He brushes his teeth, eats breakfast, gets dressed and checks his mail. His actions gradually become more unusual.
